title: Hero MotoCorp wholesales rise to 3,90,932 units in November
description: In a statement, Hero MotoCorp said it expects the momentum to build-up in the coming quarters on account of favourable economic indicators, including encouraging farm activity and positive consumer sentiments along with upcoming marriage season.
